text: I can't say I understand the WebUI code but there's no sign it looks at the Directory field. Not that I know how it propagates at all to the registration but apparently it does. Which means that as soon as you enter something in Directory, you will silently get a registration that is broken in some way. It's simply a trap.

text:
Not quite sure what you mean with

> Which means that as soon as you enter something in Directory, you will silently get a registration that is broken in some way. It's simply a trap.
though -- it's on the user to enter the right path, no? We can add some heuristic to look for valid paths, but cloning the git repo and checking the subdir you specify exists is unrealistic
